channel.title: hydrapaper on SoBo's Dev Log
channel.description: Recent content in hydrapaper on SoBo's Dev Log

item.title: Gtk4, LibAdwaita and the new Feeds
item.description: So, something big is coming for my news reader app Feeds. Most of this year, as far as personal projects go, I spent at close contact with Gtk4, libadwaita and the awesome people over at the various matrix chat rooms.

item.title: Making a D-Bus Daemon with Python and Flatpak
item.description: I learned most of this stuff from this awesome series of articles by Larry Price. Give it a read, it’s worth it. Why D-Bus daemons are quite useful tools. What would you need them for?
